item.description:
Club Country Dance Party at the Moose Lodge, 140 North Street, North Reading, MA
http://www.clubcountr...
Joe Steele, Club Country dance instructor, starts the night off at 6:00PM with an all country request hour of old and new dances.

Even if you don't know the country western dances, come meet some fun and friendly people and learn some dances in a non-intimidating environment and air Conditioned for your pleasure.

There is an EASY country dance lesson at 7:30PM.

8:30-11:30PM, dance to "Bobby Carlson and the Stones River Band " and DJ Joe.

** Cover Charge $10

The bar is open from 7:00-11:00PM

HOW TO FIND MeetUP -- Linda will be arriving by 6:30pm to reserve table with a MeetUp sign.

The MOOSE is easy to find. North Street is off of Route 28 in North Reading. The MOOSE is almost directly across the street from a white building that is a country club. When you see the sign for the Moose, drive up their long driveway. (You can't see the Moose building from the street.)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Club Country Dance Party
